text: (nabiyē!) obagē sihinen allāh (gaṇanayen) ovunva aḍu kara penvīmada, oba sitā balanu. ovunva (gaṇanayen) adhika kara, obaṭa penvā tibuṇē nam oba dhairyaya bin̆dī, yuddha kirīma gæna oba tuḷa tarka karamin siṭinnehuya. ehet allāh (obava) ārakṣā kara gattēya. niyata vaśayenma ohu hṛdayanhi æti dæya hon̆din danneki
